description: This field of poppies seems like a great place to take a break. But it's the strangest thing--Dash is suddenly very sleepy. Keep clapping if you don't want the party to fall into a deep sleep.

puzzles.description: Make Dash automatically go to sleep then automatically turn the lights off. Then make Dash automatically turn off all eye lights.
After turning off the eye lights, make Dash wake up when a clap is heard.
puzzles.introduction:
The only way to keep Dash awake is with a loud clap!  
(If Dash can't hear your clap, try tapping on Dash gently with a pen.)

hints.description: Link the state with a Clap Heard cue.

puzzles.description: After waking up, make Dash wait for 10.0 s then go to sleep again.
puzzles.introduction: After 10 s, Dash goes right back to sleep. These poppies must be powerful!

hints.description: Make a loop! Link the Wake Up state to the Sleep state using a Wait For cue set to 10.0 s.
